Description: Requirements: • Bachelor's Degree in Commerce, Finance, Accounting, or related field.• At least 3-4 years of relevant experience in accounting, preferably in Accounts Payable and General Ledger.• Strong working knowledge and experience of Excel.• Experience with SAP preferred.• Excellent analytical, decision-making, and problem-solving skills.• Attention to accuracy and details.• Proactive, collaborative and able to adapt and work well with different teams across countries.• Able to thrive in a fast-paced work environment.Job Details
